definitions.definition: A bihomogeneous polynomial in dual variables of x , y , ... and the coefficients of some homogeneous form in x , y , ... that is invariant under some group of linear transformations .

main_definition: ( algebra ) A bihomogeneous polynomial in dual variables of x , y , ... and the coefficients of some homogeneous form in x , y , ... that is invariant under some group of linear transformations .
